name: Farm Frenzy 3: American Pie
description: Can you keep up with Scarlett and the latest advancements in technology as you grow crops, feed animals, collect produce and manufacture goods? Of course you can! Just don't let the zany new animations distract you from the task at hand.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 700 MHz CPUMemory: 1024 MB RamDirectX®: 8Hard Drive: 100 MB of free space
